Title: Research Operations Senior Principal Data Analyst
JD:
About the job
    


Job Description

Research Operations Senior Principal Data Analyst, Research Operations is a leadership position within research that is responsible for ensuring that laboratory information from our San Diego research labs is being properly and consistently captured and can flow efficiently into Vertex’s corporate informatics platforms.  Laboratory information includes, but is not limited to, instrument utilization, reagent and supply availability, tracking of biological and chemical samples, and data entry associated with testing or analysis of those sample. This role will provide a key point of contact between research and other functions involved in data management, including Information Technology, Facilities and Operations, and Purchasing. This role will also be the executional lead on initiatives to simplify and streamline experimental planning and execution through automated workflows, data capture and analytics. An understanding of the pharmaceutical research process, familiarity with data science and a passion for improving this process for our scientists and staff to facilitate the discovery or new medicines is essential for success in this role. Success will be measured in the form of fewer steps and applications from experimental planning to data capture into electronic lab notebooks, while maintaining integrity of the source information

Key Roles And Responsibilities
Leadership to simplify and streamline lab operations, including biological sample management and implementation of site-wide instrumentation data infrastructure and connectivity via an internet-of-things (IOT) approach. Establish training program for employees so they have a holistic and consistent understanding of our basic lab operational ecosystem and processes, and the support available to them. This include, but is not limited to requisitioning and purchasing, capital requests, and the use of Laboratory ELNsIdentify technical solutions and support initiatives to develop and implement a sophisticated lab consumable inventory management systemSupport implementation and training for use of online ordering platforms for lab consumable and chemical purchases.In coordination with Information Technology, support implementation of IT LIMS platforms within research.Work with internal or external software developers to write requirements specific to enable software development to support agreed workflows; work with lab-based employees to ensure technical solutions adequately address critical needsDefinition of metrics and Key Performance Indicators to drive continuous improvement. Propose performance metrics and goals for lab effectiveness to Sr. Management.

Strong interpersonal skills to influence and persuade peers and leaders cross functionally Understanding of lab research processes and experience in a pharmaceutical or biotech setting supporting complex workflows Familiarity with electronic lab notebook processes and experience to design or improve interfaces using APIs Programming skills (python, R, C#, SQL, etc)Basic understanding of Six Sigma Lean principles and Continuous Improvement tools (including Pareto Charts, Flow Diagrams, etc.).Strong project management skills. Understands the importance of defining and managing the critical path; brings solutions when needed to address potential delays; laser focused on achieving milestones.Effective communication skills (both written and verbal); Building high quality decks and presentation skills.Thrives working in collaborative, team environment; ability to cultivate and maintain effective business partner relationships through earned respect and trust.Results-oriented; dependable to complete assigned tasks on-time; puts in the necessary time and effort to meet deadlines without prompting.Excellent organizational skills; able to manage multiple projects / initiatives at same time.Demonstrates good judgment, highest integrity and trust; accepts responsibility for own actions. Experience as lab manager or project manager in biotech/life science industry preferred.
